pullRequest.title: Java 14+: class transformation with records
pullRequest.bodyText:
The Java Instrumentation API does not allow record attributes to be changed.
Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com

nodes.bodyText: Missing #endif comment here and the next one.

nodes.bodyText: This is commented - delete don't update :)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -341,9 +341,9 @@ typedef enum jvmtiError {
 	JVMTI_ERROR_NAMES_DONT_MATCH = 69,
 	JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_CLASS_MODIFIERS_CHANGED = 70,
 	JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_METHOD_MODIFIERS_CHANGED = 71,
-/* #if defined(J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES) */
+/* #if defined(J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES) || (JAVA_SPEC_VERSION >= 14) */

nodes.bodyText: This should be updated to match the JDK version that brought this error in.  NESTMATES should be subsumed by the JDK release that added it
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -65,9 +65,9 @@ static const J9JvmtiErrorMapping errorMap[] = {
 	{ "JVMTI_ERROR_NAMES_DONT_MATCH" , 69 },
 	{ "JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_CLASS_MODIFIERS_CHANGED" , 70 },
 	{ "JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_METHOD_MODIFIERS_CHANGED" , 71 },
-#if defined(J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES)
+#if defined(J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES) || (JAVA_SPEC_VERSION >= 14)

nodes.bodyText: This assumes that record components can't be reordered.  Is there a connonical order defined in the spec?  If not, how does the RI handle this?  Does it require that the order of the components is stable?
nitpick - is there extra blank lines here?

nestmates was added in java 11.  This can be #ifdef'd on that version

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            #if defined(J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES) || (JAVA_SPEC_VERSION >= 15)
          
          
            
            #if (JAVA_SPEC_VERSION >= 11)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -65,9 +65,9 @@ static const J9JvmtiErrorMapping errorMap[] = {
 	{ "JVMTI_ERROR_NAMES_DONT_MATCH" , 69 },
 	{ "JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_CLASS_MODIFIERS_CHANGED" , 70 },
 	{ "JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_METHOD_MODIFIERS_CHANGED" , 71 },
-#if defined(J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES)
+#if defined(J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES) || (JAVA_SPEC_VERSION >= 15)

nodes.bodyText: Sorry to unresolve this.  Can you add a comment to that effect into the code?  It'll save rediscovering that in the future

commit.message:
Java 14+: class transformation with records

The Java Instrumentation API does not allow record attributes to be changed.

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>
